fields.summary: [VZ_CHR2FB][WebUI] Scroll down button Wrongly displayed in The WebUI :: PRPLC-12070

fields.Action: Try to access the GUI using either http://192.168.1.1 or http://Internetbox in the address bar of the browser.
fields.Expected Result:
It is possible to access the GUI using both adresses from any of the following browsers:

	
		Microsoft Edge (new IE)
	
		Internet Explorer v8 and following versions
	
		Mozilla Firefox v3 and following versions
	
		Safari v4 and following verisons
	
		Chrome v6.0 and following versions
	
		Opera v10.0 and following versions

fields.Action:
With IE, Firefox, Safari, Chrome and Opera:
- browse all webUI pages - check UI display
- check buttons (save, etc.), check boxes, tables, bitmaps
fields.Expected Result:
WebUI display and behavior should identical on all browsers.
Active objects (buttons, lists, check box, etc.) should be active on all browsers.

fields.description:
Browsers compliance

[Precondition]

	Graphical user interface access
fields.summary: [WEBUI] Browsers Compliance
